key_risks: Energy cost sensitivity due to reliance on temperature-controlled facilities
High debt levels from acquisitions and expansions

Regulatory compliance challenges in food safety and environmental standards
Intense competition in the temperature-controlled logistics sector

social_issues: Workforce management and labor practices for over 10,000 employees
